articles.title: Trains, ferries cancelled as Storm Otto crashes across northern Europe - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Hurricane-strength gusts were measured on Friday in Thorsminde, a fishing town on Denmark’s North Sea coast.
articles.content: Copenhagen, Denmark: A powerful storm over the North Sea hit northern Europe and led to dozens of train and ferry cancellations on Friday in northern Denmark and southern Norway as the Danish Meteoro… [+1420 chars]
